document.full_text: radiation levels rose slightly in russia's far east on tuesday but stayed within normal levels, officials said, as japan struggled to cope with the worst nuclear accident since the 1986 chernobyl disaster.
document.title: radiation level rises slightly in russia's far east
lines_and_colors: radiation levels rose slightly in russia's far east on tuesday but stayed within normal levels, officials said, as japan struggled to cope with the worst nuclear accident since the 1986 chernobyl disaster.
